text: often the first signs of fake friends
are subtle hardly noticeable
the feelings of exclusion and loneliness
can be crushing
especially when they come from those we
consider our friends
a friendship should be a two-way street
but for Tom it seems to be a one-way
service
fake friends take but seldom give they
consume your time energy and resources
without a second thought
dealing with fake friends can have
severe mental health implications it can
lead to stress anxiety and a sense of
worthlessness
it's a tough decision to let go of
people who you once considered friends
but it's necessary for one's own
well-being Tom begins his journey to
seek genuine connections ones that value
him as much as he values them
Tom has learned the hard way the pain of
fake friends and its effect on mental
health
but he came out stronger understanding
the true essence of friendship
